parameters.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

parameters.name: valueDate
parameters.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

parameters.name: depository
parameters.description: Person designated as depository by the company in or pursuant to this Indenture, and, unless otherwise provided with respect to any security, any successor to such person

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Contains all details of each individual currency, for example, currency name, number of decimal places together with other information such as the buy and sell rates

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The identifier of the instrument

parameters.name: deliveryInstruction
parameters.description: Customer's directions to a bank as to the disposition of funds and securities in the customer's account

parameters.name: transactionType
parameters.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: The nominal quantity

parameters.name: stockExchange

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

consentTypes.description: The consent type of for which permission is given.  Drop down list pre-defined at product level and defaulted to the account.

consentType.description: Consent Type for which the consent is given

consentGiven.description: Identifies whether the consent has been given to the customer to perform the transaction

consentBlock.description: Indicates whether consent is blocked or not. No personal data of the Client will be shared by the Bank for any purpose when the consent is blocked.

blockNotes.description: Indicates the reason for which the consent is blocked.

consentWithdraw.description: Identifies whether the consent has been withdrawn to the customer to perform the transaction

withdrawNotes.description: Notes to facilitate why the consent has been withdrawn

consentTypeName.description: Contains the name of the type of consent given to the customer

consentSubType.description: Indicates the consent sub type linked to corresponding consent type.

consentSubTypeGiven.description: Contains the sub type of consent given to the customer

arrangementId.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

effectiveDate.description: The date on which the principal movement is effected

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

travelNotifications.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

endDate.description: Indicates the date till which the transaction history requested. If 20120101 is the start date and 20120201 is the end date, all transactions that are booked between January 1 to February 1 2012 are returned

startTime.description: Contains the time job was started

endTime.description: Contains the time the job  ended.

visitPurpose.description: Specifies the purpose of the travel

scheduleType.description: The type of event schedule. The main ones are interest payment (IP) , principal increase (PI), rate reset (RR).

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context

contactDetail.description: Contains the contact details of the traveller

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

travelNotificationId.description: Denotes the identifier associated with the travel for notifications

addressDetails.description: Holds unstructured address information, e.g. Contact Person. Building, Floor, Apartment, Street Number, Street Name, Town, Area, Code

street.description: Contains the first line of customer's base address, example building number, street number etc.

addressCity.description: The town and/or city component of the base address of a customer

postCode.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer.

country.description: Identifies the country of the customer.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

officePhoneNumber.description: The office phone number of the customer

smsNumber.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer

emailId.description: Contains the email identifier of the customer

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth of an individual customer

customerStatus.description: The internal bank status of a customer

customerStatusName.description: Contains the status of the customer transaction

customerType.description: Illustrates the capacity in which a client is acting.Possible Values : Customer, Broker, Depository, Client, Counterparty, External Account Manager

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

smsNumber.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer

emailId.description: Contains the email identifier of the customer

officePhoneNumbers.description: The office phone number of the customer

officePhoneNumber.description: The office phone number of the customer

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

transactionStatus.description: Contains the current status of the transaction. For example: 'ACCC': 'AcceptedSettlementCompleted' - Settlement on the creditor's account has been completed.'ACCP': 'AcceptedCustomerProfile' - Preceding check of technical validation was successful. Customer profile check was also successful.'CANC': 'Cancelled' Payment initiation has been cancelled before execution Remark: This codeis accepted as new code by ISO20022.'RCVD': 'Received' - Payment initiation has been received by the receiving agent.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect

smsNumber.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer

emailId.description: Contains the email identifier of the customer

officePhoneNumbers.description: The office phone number of the customer

officePhoneNumber.description: The office phone number of the customer

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

code.description: The identifier of the error message

carrierId.description: Contains the identifier associated to the carrier respective to a transaction of the account

required.description: Flag to set the channel to communicate

carrierPosition.description: Identifies the position of the carrier in the arrangement

opportunityProductId.description: Contains the identifier of the product in the opportunity

opportunityDirection.description: Contains the direction of the product in the opportunity

opportunityGeneratorId.description: Contains the identifier of the generator in the opportunity

opportunityTemplateId.description: Contains the identifier of the opportunity template

opportunityTemplateDisplayName.description: Contains the display name of the opportunity template

opportunityStatus.description: Contains the status of the opportunity

opportunityProbabilitySuccess.description: Denotes the probability of success in opportunity

opportunityDisplayName.description: Contains the display name of the opportunity

advertDocImageId.description: Contains the identifier for the image of the document of the advertisement

advertDocImageType.description: Types of the image documents of the advertisement

advertDocImageMediaType.description: Types of the image document media in the advertisement

advertDocImageName.description: Contains the name for the image of the document in the advertisement

advertDetailDocImageId.description: Contains the identifier of the detailed image of the document in the advertisement

advertDetailDocImageType.description: Contains the type of the detailed image of the document in the advertisement

advertDetailDocImageMediaType.description: Contains the types of the detailed image of the document media in the advertisement

advertDetailDocImageName.description: Contains the name of the detailed image of the document of the advertisement

products.description: The product for which the pricing plan is applicable

productGroupId.description: The group, as defined by the institution, that the product belongs to.

productLineId.description: The top level product line, which the product is ultimately attached to. May be a Temenos-defined product line such as ACCOUNTS, AGENT, BUNDLE, CONSENT, DEPOSITS, LENDING, REWARDS, etc. or one defined by the institution to manage external products.

opportunityProductId.description: Contains the identifier of the product in the opportunity

opportunityDirection.description: Contains the direction of the product in the opportunity

opportunityTemplateId.description: Contains the identifier of the opportunity template

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

opportunityStatus.description: Contains the status of the opportunity

transactionApplication.description: Denotes the transaction that has taken place or will take place

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

opportunityDirection.description: Contains the direction of the product in the opportunity

opportunityTemplateId.description: Contains the identifier of the opportunity template

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

opportunityStatus.description: Contains the status of the opportunity

messages.description: Specifies the record ID of parent message.

messageId.description: The holds the record key of the message ID.

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

dateSent.description: The date when the message is sent.

sentAt.description: The time on which the message was sent.

fromDepartmentId.description: The identifier of the originating department

fromDepartmentName.description: The Account Officer in the department account officer table department account officer tab

toDepartmentId.description: The unique department identifier, to which the message is to be sent.

toDepartmentName.description: The department name, to which the message is to be sent

toCustomerId.description: The unique customer identifier of the Payee, to whom the payment message is to be sent

fromCustomerId.description: The Customer ID from which the message is triggered.

uploadId.description: The unique identifier of the uploaded file

uploadPath.description: The directory path to which the file is uploaded

messages.description: Specifies the record ID of parent message.

subject.description: The subject of the message to be sent or received.

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.

bankSortCode.description: The sort code or the national clearing code of the beneficiary bank.

BIC.description: The BIC code of the Beneficiary bank

IBAN.description: International Bank Account number, an identifier of the account. E.g. GB29 NWBK 6016 1331 9268 19

linkBeneficiaryId.description: The identifier of a beneficiary (defined by the institution) being linked to a customer-defined beneficiary

customerReference.description: The reference which is provided to the beneficiary/ creditor by the originator of payment

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account

preferredPaymentAmount.description: Preferred payment amount can be specified for the beneficiary. If specified, it will be populated during payment processing.

ourCharges.description: The charge borne by the bank for providing a financial service. Possible values: -BEN -OUR -SHA

paymentCountry.description: The country to which a payment is sent, usually where the beneficiary resides

broker.description: Specifies the counterparty with whom the trade is to be effected.

brokerName.description: The name that is displayed for the broker

brokerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding for the broker

brokerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity of the instrument outstanding for the broker

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc.

instrumentName.description: The name that is displayed for the instrument, taken from the Security Master

depository.description: Person designated as depository by the company in or pursuant to this Indenture, and, unless otherwise provided with respect to any security, any successor to such person

depositoryName.description: The name that is displayed for the depository

tradeDate.description: Standard date field which records trade date of the account

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

tradeCurrency.description: The trade currency is the settlement currency for the trade

portfolioId.description: Id of the portfolio or security account

portfolioName.description: The name that is displayed for the portfolio

accountCurrency.description: Currency of the account. For example: USD, GBP.

customerOutstandingAmount.description: The amount outstanding from/to the customer

customerOutstandingQuantity.description: The quantity outstanding from/to the customer

description.description: Contains the description of purpose of the payment.

fieldDisplayName.description: Contains the name of the display for enrichment purposes

operand.description: This field along with fieldName and value, defines the conditions for the alert to be triggered.

alertRequestId.description: The unique identifier of the alert request.

messageGroupId.description: Contains the starting message id of the conversation

productDescription.description: Indicates the description of the Product

bankCode.description: Contains the code of the bank with which the transaction is performed

paymentTemplate.description: Contains the template used for payment transactions

globalUrn.description: globalURNSpecifies the GLOBAL.URN reference of the TPP (third party provider). This will be retrieved from the request and should match a GLOBAL.URN from a record within the Open Banking Directory.

bankId.description: Contains the identifier of the bank with which the transaction is performed

bankCode.description: Contains the code of the bank with which the transaction is performed

bankName.description: The name of the bank being referred to.

logoURL.description: Contains the uniform resourcelocator of the logo

countryId.description: ISO country code of the financial institution.

extSourceProvider.description: Contains the name of the external source provider for the customer

beneficiaries.description: Identifies the Beneficiary name and address of the Standing Order

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

beneficiaryCustomerNickName.description: Contains the nickname of the beneficiary Customer

beneficiaryOurCharges.description: Indicates the bearer of the charges. For example: BEN( All transaction charges are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.), OUR (All transaction charges are to be borne by the ordering customer.), SHA (Transaction charges on the Sender's side are to be borne by the ordering customer, transaction charges on the Receiver's side are to be borne by the beneficiary customer.)

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

companyName.description: The company in which payment is processed

categoryId.description: Unique identifier associated with the product name of the account or contract. For example: For customer/counterparty accounts, the identifier would be in the range 1000 to 9999. For ledger accounts, in the range 10000 to 19999.

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

bankSortCode.description: The sort code or the national clearing code of the beneficiary bank.

linkToBeneficiaryId.description: For a customer defined beneficiaries, it specifies the link to bank defined beneficiaries.

customerReference.description: The reference which is provided to the beneficiary/ creditor by the originator of payment

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account

preferredPaymentAmount.description: Preferred payment amount can be specified for the beneficiary. If specified, it will be populated during payment processing.

paymentCountry.description: The country to which a payment is sent, usually where the beneficiary resides

preferredPaymentProductId.description: Denotes the identifier of the preferred payment product

accountWithBankSortCode.description: Bank sort code details with account
